body_html: @xiezhongzhao What version of Cuda are you using? For tensorflow 1.5 you must have installed the Cuda 9.0 and for tensorflow 1.4 you must use cuda 8.0. If the the tensorflow version and cuda version are compatible, then check the environment variables i.e. CUDA_HOME and LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
body_text: @xiezhongzhao What version of Cuda are you using? For tensorflow 1.5 you must have installed the Cuda 9.0 and for tensorflow 1.4 you must use cuda 8.0. If the the tensorflow version and cuda version are compatible, then check the environment variables i.e. CUDA_HOME and LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
body: @xiezhongzhao What version of Cuda are you using? For tensorflow 1.5 you must have installed the Cuda 9.0 and for tensorflow 1.4 you must use cuda 8.0. If the the tensorflow version and cuda version are compatible, then check the environment variables i.e. `CUDA_HOME `and `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`.
